ygData.subject: RE: dual weild
ygData.msgSnippet: aye i do understand how some skills do not require a point but will take long to build, but others MUST have 1 point put into them to have you learn the
ygData.messageBody:
aye i do understand how some skills do not require a point but will take
long to build, but others MUST have 1 point put into them to have you learn
the basics, otherwise they will never raise no matter how much button
mashing hehe. some skills when you reach the level and put 1 point in them,
it will say "You have increased your skill in..." but different ones will
say "You have learned the basics of..." with the first, you don't need the
1 point, but with the second you do. i thought that our duel wield needed
one, but i am not positive.

Shada

>
> From: Abraham Hardjana <ahardjan@...>
>
> Well you are able to live without putting a asingle point
> into the skill.
> It will take forever to get the first few points through
> actually using
> it. I tried to do begging from scratch while waiting for the boat. I
> think I had to hit that button about 200-300 times before I got the
> begging(1) message. What can I say I took the boat a lot in
> my youth back
> in the days when there was only one boat travelling from
> Butcherblock and
> Freeport ^_^.
>
> Treilanin Loreweaver
>
>
> On Wed, 17 Nov 1999, Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas) wrote:
>
> > From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)"
> <Michael.Garramone@...>
> >
> > like many skills (e.g. warrior's double attack) i thought
> we had to put 1
> > skill point into duel wield to learn the basics. could be
> wrong though
> > hehe.
> >
> > Shada
